content.prompt: The willingness of Russia to support Serbia, as mentioned by Cartwright, is best explained by which of the following?

choices.label: Development of an increasingly rigid system of alliances involving all major European powers
Attempts to unite all Slavic peoples into a single nation-state
Initiatives to create an effective international disarmament treaty
Efforts to block British influence in the Balkans

topic.text: 7.9: Causation in 19th-Century Perspectives and Political Developments

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
